snippet.title: Shadow King Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Available now at https://johanpeitz.itch.io/shadow-king

The Shadow King has invaded the castle belonging to the Knights of Valor and they need your help to get it back! Explore the massive castle in this metroidvania and help the fallen knights back to their former glory! Upgrade your moves and weapons along the way as you fight minions, defeat bosses, find secrets, and unravel what has happened.

Design/Art/Code: Johan Peitz (https://www.patreon.com/johanpeitz)  
Music/Sound: José Garcia (https://bibikigarcia.com)

Many thanks to my supporters on Patreon for making it possible to keep making games like this. Subscribers get each game as soon as it is out (plus source code, early access, and all that jazz)!
